name: DailyFood
0:
”Alexa, ask Daily Food for Saturday”
”Alexa, get food for today from Daily Food”
”Alexa, open Daily Food and get food for tomorrow.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily food
des: Given a date (today, Saturday, July 1st, etc...), the Daily Food skill will tell you which food and/or drinks are celebrated on that day. Great conversation starters, and this skill may even help you decide what to cook for dinner each week!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
